'''Tale of the King's Squire''' is a [[Diagram]] obtained from [[Aravinay]] in exchange for one [[Stories of You and the Aranara]]. Once used, it allows the player to [[Forging|forge]] the 4-Star [[bow]] [[King's Squire]].
